website_summaries.verdict: The higher price for this slipcover gives you excellent quality. The three separate pieces add up to a more precise fit.
pros: Fits loveseats measuring 58" to 73" from outside arm to outside arm

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: I just received my loveseat cover today. It was easy to install (took 10 minutes) and it fits nicely. For the inside of the loveseat, I had to tuck the material inside the creases to make sure that the cover laid as flat as possible. Overall I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Lynch

customer_reviews.title: miss labeled product, says taupe on package.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the color I wanted. I ordered taupe and I kept getting, like the picture at the left, chocolate. the little picture changed at check out! I tried twice and returned both times. It was a color labeling issue. I didn't open it. I ordered the two piece Sure Fit love seat cover in sand, and it arrived as the pictures showed, in Sand. The fit and color is great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits, soft and great for cats!
customer_reviews.text: It fits and its super soft! We put it on REALLY fast so it's a little disheveled here and there, plus our couch was slumping in a few places already, so it doesn't look as nice as in the photo, but that's all on us. We have two cats (golden and silver colored, long haired) and they haven't been scratching at the material (thank goodness because we bought this cover to hide the torn to shreds couch fabric) and their hair blends in pretty well. The hair is very easy to remove, just wipe it off and ball it up with your hands.
customer_reviews.author: KatieS

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on chair and a half!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! After returning a one piece stretch slipcover I took a chance on this. Fits amazing, there are a few seams that are slightly off but it can't be perfect when made for a variety of love seats. I used this on a large armed chair and a half and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover. Um, it is a slipcover, so I can't get too excited, but it was just as advertised! I only wish they had a few more colors to choose from. This one happens to be a bit too dark and brown for what I needed. A more tan-taupe would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RoseIL

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well. The 3 piece works well so ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. The 3 piece works well so the cushions do not slide.
customer_reviews.author: d. Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Money Saving!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to cover couches instead of buy new furniture and these look great. The loveseat doesn't fit as well as the sofa but still looks great. Very soft and great texture!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Transformation
customer_reviews.text: It fit OK. Was kind of hard to get the back pillows squished into the cover. It works well for me. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Fits well overall but we have very deep cushions with ample stuffing and its a bit tight but I t did fit, barely.
customer_reviews.author: Element07

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I spent extra time and used filling to make the cushions look full again. I am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Wise

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific product! Bought a cheap love seat and purchased this slipcover! Looked just like new! So happy with this purchase. Very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Langston

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting slipcovers!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new stretch slipcovers from Sure Fit. They fit my sofa and loveseat like a glove. I've got many compliments from friends and family. It looks like I bought brand new couches.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis barrale

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a new couch
customer_reviews.text: The slipcovers were easy to put on. It looks like a new couch and now matches our decor. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

product_meta.title: SureFit Stretch Pique 3-Piece - Loveseat Slipcover - Taupe
product_meta.description: For a custom-fit look, this 3-piece will not disappoint you The separate pillow cover is designed to cover your removable loose back pillows. With the zipper closure it's easy to remove for machine washing. 94-Percent Polyester / 6-Percent Spandex.
feature_bullets: Part of the Stretch Pique collection
Our product allows you to create custom upholstered look. Review our collections for the size of product, type of material and color that best suits what you are looking for.

Our product fits chairs from 30" to 45" wide; loveseats from 55" to 70" wide; sofas from 55" to 70" wide, sectionals vary, ottomans vary, recliners vary. Please measure width of the back of your backrest to detemine an optimal size for your furniture cover. You can also check our website for examples.

For installation procedures begin from the backside making sure it covers the entire item, then move it slowly down to fit over product to insure proper fit. For more instructions please see further down on this item and or contact us by checking "Your Orders" and clicking "Contact Seller".
We offer a variety of product for chairs, sofas, loveseats, recliners, dining chair, ottomans and pillows. So go for it! Coordinate a complete NEW LOOK!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars17 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
